comment: Lemma for ~ cznrng : The base set of the ring constructed from a ` Z/nZ ` structure by replacing the (multiplicative) ring operation by a constant operation is the base set of the ` Z/nZ ` structure. (Contributed by AV, 16-Feb-2020.)
